name: token-budget-js
description: Token counting, budget checking, and text chunking for LLM APIs

ai.summary: Estimate token counts, check context-window budgets, chunk text to fit token limits, and trim conversations to a budget.
capabilities: Estimate token count in a string (no external dependencies)
Check whether a message list fits within a token budget
Split text into chunks that each fit within a token limit
Trim a conversation to fit a budget by removing oldest messages
ai.inputs: Strings, arrays of {role, content} message objects, token budget numbers
ai.outputs: Token counts (number), budget check results ({fits, total, remaining}), text chunks (string[]), trimmed message arrays
